alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Red Lodge Foothills (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 1:52PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Stillwater and west central Carbon Counties through 215 PM MDT... At 152 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Absarokee, or 15 miles north of Red Lodge, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cooney Reservoir State Park and Fishtail. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Beartooth Foothills; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Red Lodge Foothills
